title: JoyStick Mapper 1.1 Mac TORRENT MAVERICKS CONFIRMED
description:
Please consider buying it in the App Store, it's cheap and well worth the price.

You can map any game controller with this application. PS3, Xbox 360, PS4, Xbox One, etc. (Xbox controllers may need drivers)

It works for OSX 10.6.6 or later.

Mavericks (OSX 10.9) users may or may not have some problems, for those who do:

This is an issue with the App Nap feature in the update,
You must disable App Nap for Joystick Mapper.

You must follow these steps to fix the problem:

1. Find Joystick Mapper.app in the Applications folder
2. Control-click the folder
3. Choose "Get info";
4. Click "Prevent App Nap"

This should fix your problems.

SEED! And I'll upload more apps you might find useful!

-Saint
